This film combines elements of war and drama, as a retired American military officer is recruited by the Japanese government to help modernize their army but becomes torn between his loyalty to the soldiers he trains and the samurai they oppose.

If you're looking for something more grounded in reality and with a stronger focus on war, "Patton" is another fantastic choice. This Oscar-winning film tells the story of the controversial general George S. Patton during World War II. It features a powerful performance by George C. Scott as Patton himself.
